list.feed: The award-winning Firefox Web browser has security, speed and new features that will change the way you use the Web. Don't settle for anything less.
The goal of clanbomber is to blow away your opponents using bombs, but avoid being blown up yourself.

ROX-Filer is a fast and powerful graphical file manager. It has full drag-and- drop support and background file operations, and is highly configurable. It can also act as a pinboard, allowing you to pin frequently used files to the desktop background.

Blender is a fully integrated 3D animation suite for use in animation, still graphics, scientific and engineering visualization, and game content creation.
It includes tools for modeling, texturing (node based materials or uv mapped), uv mapping, ...

feed.name: OpenTTD
feed.summary: Open Source clone of Transport Tycoon Deluxe

list.feed: OpenTTD is an open source clone of the Microprose game "Transport Tycoon Deluxe", a popular game originally written by Chris Sawyer. It attempts to mimic the original game as closely as possible while extending it with new features.

feed.name: GCompris
feed.summary: Full featured educational application for children from 2 to 10

list.feed: Full featured educational application for children from 2 to 10

Solfege is a free ear training program written in python using gtk+ and
PyGTK. Solfege is expected to work on any OS where python, gtk+ and
pygtk are ported, but some adjustments might be necessary.
